lead_paragraph: NBC Sports Network will air 330 hours of events during the Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, the most of any of NBCUniversal's TV networks.

headline.print_headline: NBCSN to Air 330 Hours of Events During Rio Olympics
headline.main: NBCSN to Air 330 Hours of Events During Rio Olympics
